tag_list: web, marketing, social, media, writing, content, manager
overview:
Andy is a tech and social-savvy individual who has been managing Web sites and marketing on the Web for ten years. Naturally, his Web interests led to deep social media interest and communication across the many mediums available today.

Andy is currently the Online Marketing Manager at Freeman, a general services contractor for the trade show industry. Prior to his work with Freeman he spent eight years managing Web projects and marketing Financial services on the Web for Fidelity and First Command Financial Planning.
